segments.text: pigeon eating a piece of bread

critique: The pigeon pecks at the piece of bread a few times initially, then walks counterclockwise around the bread in a full circle before returning to its original position to continue pecking.

captions.single: The video shows a pigeon eating a piece of bread on the ground. The pigeon is black with a white patch near its beak and a white tail. There is one more pigeon in the background walking here and there.
